Hello world!

AssistantCard
This Class represents the AssistantCard
AssistantCardNotPlayableException
Class AssistantCardNotPlayableException is thrown whenever the Player attempts to use an Assistant Card which cannot be played since another player already used it in the same turn
AssistantCardPane
A rescalable anchor pane that displays assistant cards, with support for clicks
AssistantCardPickerView
A modal popup which presents the user with a grid of possible assistant card choices
AssistantCardSelectionHandler
Interface AssistantCardSelectionHandler represents a callback for executing an action depending on the chosen assistant card

Tests assistant cards
AssistantPickerPane
A pane representing a group of available and clickable assistant cards, arranged in a grid layout

An Anchor Pane that removes itself as subscriber for notifications

Character
This Class represents the Character used for Character cards
CharacterCard
This Class is the abstract base class representing the CharacterCards
CharacterCardActionInvalidException
Class CharacterCardActionInvalidException is thrown whenever a CharacterCard is used improperly
CharacterCardAlreadyInUseException
Class CharacterCardAlreadyInUseException is thrown whenever the Player attempts to use a Character Card which cannot be played since another player is already using it
CharacterCardBean
This Class represents a data object that snapshots a Character card, so that it can be sent over the network to Clients
CharacterCardBeanTest
Test the CharacterCardBean
CharacterCardContainer
A rescalable container for holding a set of 3 CharacterCardPanes
CharacterCardExecutor
This Interface represents the CharacterCardExecutor closure that is used by each card to define its own behavior
CharacterCardExtractor
The class used to randomly extract Character Cards for a match
CharacterCardExtractorTest
Class CharacterCardExtractorTest tests CharacterCardExtractor.
CharacterCardGenericPane
Class CharacterCardGenericPane represent the generic CharacterCardPane, for a generic-type character card
CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException
this class rapresent an exception that is thrown when we send incorrect character card parameter
CharacterCardInputView
This Class represent the CharacterCardInputView that parses user input to get the parameters for using a Character Card
CharacterCardMNStepsPane
Class CharacterCardMNStepsPane represent the CharacterCard altering Mother Nature steps
CharacterCardNetworkParamSet
Class CharacterCardNetworkParamSet represent the set of Character Card parameters which will be sent over the network
CharacterCardNetworkParamSetTest
Tests related to the Character Card Network Parameters
CharacterCardNoMoreUsesAvailableException
this class represents an exception that is thrown when player tries to use a character card which has no more uses available
CharacterCardNotPurchasedException
Class CharacterCardNotPurchasedException is thrown whenever the Player attempts to use a Character Card which has not been purchased by the Player
CharacterCardPane
Class CharacterCardPane represent the base abstract class for the rescalable pane used to display and use CharacterCards
CharacterCardPaneBuilder
A factory for CharacterCardPanes
CharacterCardParamSet
An object that encapsulates all optional parameters required by CharacterCard to perform its action This class lets CharacterCard's useCard method know what the user has selected (e.g.: the Student color that has to be moved, the additional Mother Nature steps) in order to perform the card action.
CharacterCardParamSet.StopCardMovementMode
An enum with the possible Stop Card movements, either to the Card or to an Island
CharacterCardParamSetTest
Class CharacterCardParamSetTest tests CharacterCardParamSet.
CharacterCardStopCardHostPane
Class CharacterCardStopCardHostPane represent the CharacterCard which sets Stop Cards
CharacterCardStudentHostPane
Class CharacterCardStudentHostPane represent the CharacterCards hosting Students
CharacterCardStudentPickerPane
Class CharacterCardStudentPickerPane represent the CharacterCard that allows the user to pick a student
CharacterTest
Class CharacterTest tests Character.
CleanableController
A JavFX Controller which auto-cleans itself as subscriber for notifications
Client
Class Client is the executable for the Client
ClientActionCommand
The enum holds a list of constants representing possible CLI commands
ClientCommandTag
The enum holds a list of constants representing possible Client parameters
Cloud
Cloud class represent the cloud on which are the Student
CloudPane
Class CloudPane represent the JavaFX pane for the Cloud
CloudPickInvalidException
This class represents an exception that is thrown when the player chooses an empty cloud, unless the Bag is also empty
CloudsContainer
Class CloudsContainer represent the JavaFX container for the CloudPanes, managing their position
CloudTest
Class CloudTest test Cloud Coverage 100%
CollectionUnderflowError
this class represents an exception that is thrown when the player try to take a number of students from an object that doesn't contain the required number of Students
EmptyCollectionException
this class represents an exception that is thrown when the player tries to take an element from an empty collection

This Class display the last window of the game with the winners
FaderPane
Class FaderPane represent the pane for the non-current Player
GameClient
The main Client-side class handling network communication with the Server This class wraps around the Socket connected with the Server to provide easy access to methods such as sending messages.

Class GameController represents the controller of the game

Class IncorrectConstructorParametersException is thrown whenever a constructor is initialized with wrong parameters

this class represents an exception that is thrown when player tries to place more towers than what are available

Class InvalidPlayerCountException is thrown whenever a match is created with a wrong Player count for the match type
Island
Island Class represent the Islands of the game
IslandContainer
Class IslandContainer is the javaFX container for the Islands It manages their position in the main view and their arrangement in circles, and updates the number of visible islands depending on the table state
IslandPane
Class IslandPane represent the rescalable pane for an Island
IslandSkippedControlAssignmentForStopCardException
Class IslandSkippedControlAssignmentForStopCardException is thrown whenever an Island's control assignment needs to be skipped because on the Island is present the stop card
IslandSkippedInfluenceForStopCardException
Class IslandSkippedInfluenceForStopCardException is thrown whenever an Island's influence calculation needs to be skipped because on the Island is present the stop card

Interface for the rescale feature

Class MessageDecodeException is thrown whenever the Network message's decoding process failed

A utility class for formatting model objects in teh CLI
NetworkMessage
Abstract class representing the network messages
NetworkMessageDecoder
Class NetworkMessageDecoder represent the message decoder
NetworkMessageDecoder.DummyMessage
A dummy message which only contains the class type and which mirrors the abstract class, so that we can identify the encoded class and decode the right message
NetworkMessageDecoderTest
Tests related to the NetworkMessageDecoder class
NicknameNotUniqueException
Class NicknameNotUniqueException is thrown when a player chooses an already existing nickname
Notification
A container for information broadcast through a notification center to all registered observers.
NotificationCallback
Functional interface that represents a callback invoked by the Notification Center when a Notification must be dispatched
NotificationCenter
A notification dispatch mechanism that enables the broadcast of information to registered observers.

The tests for the NotificationCenter class
NotificationKeys
Enum NotificationKeys are the keys for the notification contents in the userInfo
NotificationName
Enum NotificationName are all the Notification's names
